name: Farmagedon
description:
Get ready to defend your farm from a herds of bloodthirsty robots!

Shoot, Chainsaw or Stomp them to protect your home

Get into flow of absolute Mayhem, with fast paced combat, adrenaline inducing music and 50 shades of total destruction!

Get your hands on not 1, not 2, but 3 VERY BIG GUNS, hidden all over the map with lots of secrets!

Team Red Spark, wishes you an amazing enterntainment!

Game was inspired by Love Death & Robots, specificaly the episode "Suits" and also lots of great classic fps shooters

🏠❌🤖
